faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can modify the roadmap structure, add your own resources, and adjust the learning sequence to match your specific goals and pace.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this learning roadmap works with any Notion plan and focuses on core features available to all users, though some advanced resources may cover AI features.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Very simple - this is a ready-to-use roadmap that requires no technical setup, just follow the structured learning path provided.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: The roadmap structure remains relevant, though you should verify that linked external resources reflect Notion's latest features and interface updates.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The roadmap includes links to community resources and official Notion documentation, plus you can seek help in Notion user communities referenced in the materials.
